source: Hong Kong Common Chinese Medicinal Materials
description: Commonly used Chinese herbs in Hong Kong TCM practice

herbs.name: Ginseng
herbs.description: Tonifies qi, strengthens spleen and lung, calms spirit

herbs.name: Astragalus Root
herbs.description: Tonifies qi, consolidates exterior, promotes urination

herbs.name: Angelica Root
herbs.description: Tonifies blood, regulates menstruation, moistens intestines

herbs.name: Rehmannia Root
herbs.description: Tonifies blood and yin, nourishes kidney essence

herbs.name: Licorice Root
herbs.description: Tonifies spleen qi, clears heat, harmonizes other herbs

herbs.name: Goji Berry
herbs.description: Nourishes liver and kidney yin, brightens eyes

herbs.name: Schisandra Berry
herbs.description: Astringes lung qi, tonifies kidney, calms spirit

herbs.name: Chrysanthemum Flower
herbs.description: Disperses wind-heat, clears liver heat, brightens eyes

herbs.name: Honeysuckle Flower
herbs.description: Clears heat, detoxifies, disperses wind-heat

herbs.name: Scutellaria Root
herbs.description: Clears heat, dries dampness, stops bleeding

herbs.name: Coptis Rhizome
herbs.description: Clears heat, dries dampness, detoxifies

herbs.name: Poria
herbs.description: Promotes urination, strengthens spleen, calms spirit

herbs.name: Atractylodes Rhizome
herbs.description: Tonifies spleen qi, dries dampness, stabilizes exterior

herbs.name: Coix Seed
herbs.description: Promotes urination, strengthens spleen, clears heat

herbs.name: Pinellia Rhizome
herbs.description: Dries dampness, transforms phlegm, harmonizes stomach

herbs.name: Tangerine Peel
herbs.description: Regulates qi, dries dampness, transforms phlegm

herbs.name: Magnolia Bark
herbs.description: Promotes qi circulation, dries dampness, reduces distension

herbs.name: Cinnamon Bark
herbs.description: Warms kidney yang, strengthens fire, disperses cold

herbs.name: Aconite Root
herbs.description: Restores yang, rescues from collapse, warms spleen and kidney
herbs.contraindications: Pregnancy, yin deficiency with heat signs

herbs.name: Dried Ginger
herbs.description: Warms middle jiao, rescues yang, warms lung

herbs.name: Ephedra Herb
herbs.description: Induces sweating, promotes urination, stops wheezing

herbs.name: Cassia Twig
herbs.description: Releases exterior, warms yang qi, promotes qi and blood circulation

herbs.name: White Peony Root
herbs.description: Nourishes blood, regulates menstruation, calms liver yang

herbs.name: Ligusticum Rhizome
herbs.description: Activates blood, promotes qi circulation, expels wind

herbs.name: Red Peony Root
herbs.description: Clears heat, cools blood, activates blood circulation

herbs.name: Safflower
herbs.description: Activates blood, removes blood stasis, regulates menstruation

herbs.name: Peach Kernel
herbs.description: Activates blood, removes blood stasis, moistens intestines

herbs.name: Gastrodia Rhizome
herbs.description: Calms liver wind, stops tremors, relieves headache

herbs.name: Uncaria Stem
herbs.description: Calms liver wind, clears heat, relieves spasms

herbs.name: Dragon Bone
herbs.description: Calms spirit, astringes essence, stops bleeding

herbs.name: Oyster Shell
herbs.description: Calms liver yang, astringes essence, softens hardness

herbs.name: Polygala Root
herbs.description: Calms spirit, expels phlegm, reduces swelling

herbs.name: Jujube Date
herbs.description: Tonifies spleen qi, nourishes blood, calms spirit

herbs.name: Fresh Ginger
herbs.description: Releases exterior, warms middle jiao, stops vomiting

herbs.name: Platycodon Root
herbs.description: Opens lung qi, expels phlegm, promotes discharge of pus

herbs.name: Fritillaria Bulb
herbs.description: Clears heat, transforms phlegm, stops cough

herbs.name: Ophiopogon Root
herbs.description: Nourishes yin, moistens lung, clears heart heat

herbs.name: Dendrobium Stem
herbs.description: Nourishes stomach yin, clears heat, brightens eyes

herbs.name: American Ginseng
herbs.description: Tonifies qi, nourishes yin, clears heat

herbs.name: Cordyceps
herbs.description: Tonifies lung and kidney, stops bleeding, transforms phlegm

herbs.name: Eucommia Bark
herbs.description: Tonifies liver and kidney, strengthens bones and tendons

herbs.name: Morinda Root
herbs.description: Tonifies kidney yang, strengthens bones and tendons

herbs.name: Epimedium Herb
herbs.description: Tonifies kidney yang, strengthens bones and tendons

herbs.name: Dipsacus Root
herbs.description: Tonifies liver and kidney, strengthens bones and tendons

herbs.name: Achyranthes Root
herbs.description: Activates blood, strengthens bones and tendons, promotes urination

herbs.name: Polygonum Root
herbs.description: Tonifies liver and kidney, nourishes blood, blackens hair

herbs.name: Lycium Root Bark
herbs.description: Clears heat, cools blood, clears lung heat

herbs.name: Moutan Bark
herbs.description: Clears heat, cools blood, activates blood circulation

herbs.name: Gardenia Fruit
herbs.description: Clears heat, eliminates irritability, cools blood

herbs.name: Rhubarb Root
herbs.description: Purges heat, activates blood, detoxifies
